original_title: Air Force training aircraft crashes killing two officers
original_body_lines: A training aircraft of the Sri Lanka Air Force (SLAF) has crashed inside the SLAF Academy in China Bay a few minutes after the take-off this morning, killing the pilot and an officer, the SLAF said.
Air Force Spokesman Captain Dushan Wijesinghe said the aircraft took off at 11.25 am this morning and crashed at 11.27 am leaving both the pilot and the officer who were aboard dead.
Meanwhile, Air Force Commander Air Marshal Udeni Rajapaksa has appointed a special committee to further inquire into the incident.(Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya and Amadoru Amarajeewa)
